column2: Diathesis stress or differntial susceptibility? Testing the relationship between stressful life events, neuroticism, and internet gaming disorder amog Chinese adolescents
column3: NA
column13: This study examined how stressful life events was associated with adolescent internet gaming disorder and tested the moderator role of neuroticism. It says that they provided valuable information for early prevention and intervention of adolesent IGD - but again this study is not testing and measuring the effectiveness of an intervention or a treatment. Then they further tested whether the interaction of stressful life events and neuroticism supported the diathesis model or the differentail susceptibility model, based on the discrepancy of prior study results.
